name: ADV_EVT_MED_ATTR_HISTORY
description: This table contains the history of this adverse event's attribution to the associated medication. Together with ADV_EVT_MED_HISTORY, these tables contain the history of an adverse event's medication attributions.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the adverse event history in the adverse event record. Together with ADVERSE_EVENT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the ADVERSE_EVENT_HISTORY table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple attribution levels for the corresponding medication record that is related to the adverse event at the time the adverse event was documented.

columns.name: HX_MEDICATION_ATTRIBUTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The attribution level category ID for the corresponding medication to the adverse event at the time the adverse event was documented.
